alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:37PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Mobile and west central Baldwin Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 136 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorms extending from near Saraland to near Axis to near Stockton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Prichard, Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Creola, Stockton, Axis, I65 And AL 225, I65 And I165 and I65 And AL 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
